On Spirit & Scale

October 26, 2016

". . . God is bigger, more expansive, more powerful than any of us have the capacity to conceptualize. And I believe that this has to be the case, not for the observable reasons I can point to, but instead because of the times when I can’t point to a single one."

On Spirit & Scale

October 19, 2016

". . . God is bigger, more expansive, more powerful than any of us have the capacity to conceptualize. And I believe that this has to be the case, not for the observable reasons or miracles I can point to, but instead because of the times when I can’t point to a single one."

Who's Holbemn?
